alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 12 at 7:53AM CST until January 12 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 10 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ARKANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST ARKANSAS CHICOT IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA EAST CARROLL FRANKLIN MADISON RICHLAND TENSAS WEST CARROLL IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 30 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW HINDS HOLMES HUMPHREYS LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI KEMPER LAUDERDALE NESHOBA NEWTON NOXUBEE WINSTON IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CARROLL GRENADA LEFLORE MONTGOMERY WEBSTER IN NORTHEAST MISSISSIPPI CLAY LOWNDES OKTIBBEHA IN NORTHWEST MISSISSIPPI SUNFLOWER WASHINGTON IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI CLAIBORNE IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ISSAQUENA SHARKEY WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, ANGUILLA, BELZONI, BRANDON, BROOKSVILLE, CANTON, CARROLLTON, CARTHAGE, COLUMBUS, CONEHATTA, DE KALB, DECATUR, DELHI, DERMOTT, DURANT, EPPS, EUDORA, EUPORA, FOREST, GOODMAN, GREENVILLE, GREENWOOD, GRENADA, INDIANOLA, ISOLA, JACKSON, KOSCIUSKO, LAKE PROVIDENCE, LAKE VILLAGE, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MACON, MADISON, MATHISTON, MAYERSVILLE, MERIDIAN, MORTON, NEWELLTON, NEWTON, NORTH CARROLLTON, OAK GROVE, PEARL, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, RAYVILLE, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROLLING FORK, RULEVILLE, SCOOBA, ST. JOSEPH, STARKVILLE, TALLULAH, TCHULA, UNION, VAIDEN, VICKSBURG, WATERPROOF, WEIR, WEST POINT, WINNSBORO, WINONA, AND YAZOO CITY.
